body: I thought I blacklisted Loli & Shotacon. And yes, this is age regression as well, but still he reverted back into a child, so again with what I say to everything I blacklist: PLEASE TAG THESE DOUJINS CORRECTLY SO I DON’T HAVE TO COMPLAIN ABOUT THEM! IT GET ANNOYING TO SEE THEM AFTER BLACKLISTING THEM, AND IT GETS ANNOYING TO COMPLAIN ABOUT A SIMPLE FIX!
